attributes.action: Hold a general election on the 27th of June 2007, so that the people of Great Britain may decide who will become the next Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 27th of June this year we will get a new P.M. who appears to have almost no support from the people.  If we truly live in a democracy then the leader of the country should be democratically elected.
